cast.name: 达莎·韦列夏金娜 Darya Vereshchagina

introduction: Famous rap artist Nikita Prozorov was kidnapped from an apartment in the center of Moscow. Investigator Ivanov finds out that the kidnapping was staged, and Nikita's mother, Renata, a television producer, is involved in this. Nikita was taken to the clinic in an unconscious state and treated using an experimental computer technology for personality psycho-correction. To understand the motives and reasons for Renata's act, the investigator will have to piece by piece reconstruct the history of the complicated relationship between mother and son, and answer the question of whether Renata killed her son or saved his life.Ratings
